channel.title: How To Make New Shops?
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape.. im not 100% sure on how to make a new shop..? i know how to make a new NPC.. but... how do i make it where when i click on "trade" or "talk" it open's up a shop... EASY TERMS: How do i make a new shop?
Thanks for helping moparscape BYE!! (317, delta)

item.title: How To Make New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“DivineSouls, post:9, topic:365755”][quote author=Perses Pkers link=topic=461952.msg3379385#msg3379385 date=1287894852]
Ok Thanks For Being nice… but one question…
Here’s 1 Of My Shop Codes

shop = 34	Premium Member Shop				2	2	1037	1	1419	1	2583	1	2585	1	2587	1	2589	1	2591	1	2593	1	2595	1	2597	1	2599	1	2601	1	2603	1	2605	1	2607	1	2609	1	2611	1	2613	1	2615	1	2617	1	2619	1	2621	1

So Where It says “shop = 34” the 34 is the npc ID?
[/quote]

34 Does not represent the NPC ID. Depending on what source you have it’s different where the shops are located. In Delta, if you scan for shop 34, you will eventually find an NPC that represents shop 34. This all can be found in client.java.

So if you are using Delta, here’s the case I’m talking about.

if(NPCID == 2536){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

Is the shop number 2536? No, that’s the NPC ID, the shop number is 43, that corresponds with the NPC with the ID of 2536.[/quote] thanks

Read full topic

item.title: How To Make New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[quote=“Perses Pkers, post:3, topic:365755”]Ok Thanks For Being nice… but one question…
Here’s 1 Of My Shop Codes

shop = 34	Premium Member Shop				2	2	1037	1	1419	1	2583	1	2585	1	2587	1	2589	1	2591	1	2593	1	2595	1	2597	1	2599	1	2601	1	2603	1	2605	1	2607	1	2609	1	2611	1	2613	1	2615	1	2617	1	2619	1	2621	1

So Where It says “shop = 34” the 34 is the npc ID?[/quote]

34 Does not represent the NPC ID. Depending on what source you have it’s different where the shops are located. In Delta, if you scan for shop 34, you will eventually find an NPC that represents shop 34. This all can be found in client.java.

So if you are using Delta, here’s the case I’m talking about.

if(NPCID == 2536){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

Is the shop number 2536? No, that’s the NPC ID, the shop number is 43, that corresponds with the NPC with the ID of 2536.

the id you given does not EXIST!

item.title: How To Make New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

use the search button in future however ill be nice for once i usually tell people to get lost and search as there are plenty of guides out there.

goto shops.cfg or shopshandler it all depends, you will see your current shops.

change the npc id = to what ever npc you want to use as that specific shop next will be the description i.e. general store etc etc, after that will be your item id’s and prices simples.

as i said in future use the search button please its there for a reason

Read full topic
